title: HB Wallet
author: HB Wallet
content: zkSync airdrop event is not an official one, but a retroactive case.This means the event is not a guaranteed thing, but a high probability match.Supporters will be able to receive free native token of zkSync once it launches in the near future.To be eligible, you need to actually participate in the network, please find a few things you can do in our article zkSync Airdrop.

comments.author: RussiaUkraineTranslation
comments.body: Quote from: HB Wallet on July 25, 2022, 07:24:19 AMzkSync airdrop event is not an official one, but a retroactive case.This means the event is not a guaranteed thing, but a high probability match.Supporters will be able to receive free native token of zkSync once it launches in the near future.To be eligible, you need to actually participate in the network, please find a few things you can do in our article zkSync Airdrop.BTW, the link here goes to keyring.app, which may be a scam site. I have never heard of them and I doubt you need to download their wallet to participate in the zkSync airdrop.

comments.author: Grim149x
comments.body: Iwish  zksync is have a huge airdrop for all user ihope iam eligible if they will airdrop there own token. That is exciting and ihope it will be next dydx price iam waiting on this . How about airbitrium do you have an idea it will be airdrop or not?

comments.author: asriloni
comments.body: Quote from: RussiaUkraineTranslation on July 25, 2022, 04:16:07 PMQuote from: HB Wallet on July 25, 2022, 07:24:19 AMzkSync airdrop event is not an official one, but a retroactive case.This means the event is not a guaranteed thing, but a high probability match.Supporters will be able to receive free native token of zkSync once it launches in the near future.To be eligible, you need to actually participate in the network, please find a few things you can do in our article zkSync Airdrop.BTW, the link here goes to keyring.app, which may be a scam site. I have never heard of them and I doubt you need to download their wallet to participate in the zkSync airdrop.There's no need to download the wallet. Use zksync mainnet was enough for you to be eligible for airdrop (possible thing).It's better if you are reading it here https://airdrops.io/zksync/I will not believe any other source the force the participant to download the wallet, that has a very high possibility to be a scam website. Zksync was a protocol and downloading wallet from unknown party is a very high risk decision by anyone who wanna participate in the airdrop. It's a scam.
